Using START_ELEMENT to parse untrusted XML data is known to be vulnerable to XML attacks. Replace START_ELEMENT with the equivalent defusedxml package, or make sure defusedxml.defuse_stdlib() is called.
Using make_parser to parse untrusted XML data is known to be vulnerable to XML attacks. Replace make_parser with the equivalent defusedxml package, or make sure defusedxml.defuse_stdlib() is called.
